recommendation: On 12 December 2019 the Commission recommended to the Director of Maritime New Zealand that they ensure all operators working under Maritime Rules Part 82 have identified on each jet boat all systems that are critical to the safe operation of the boat, and to have a documented inspection and maintenance system in place that covers those critical systems and also ensures they meet manufacturersâ€™ specifications. The inspection and maintenance system should complement rather than replace any existing system of daily checks.
safety_issue: the operator's planned maintenance programme did not ensure that the manufacturers' specifications were met for the jet boat's steering and control system

safety_issue: the operator's hazard identification system had not identified the risk that a system critical to the safety of the jet boat could fail
